intro: Echites xanthostomus, commonly known as the yellow-stemmed echites, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Its yellow stems and foliage are distinctive features, and it produces small, white to pale yellow flowers. Echites xanthostomus is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
